short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Retrieve active tab's URL and send it to Smartertime app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plugin to track Chrome website on Linux with the Smarter Time client. The client can be downloaded from https://github.com/Smartertime/SmarterTimeLinux/ and requires the Smarter Time for Android app.
